attributes.title: Chelsea and Steffie's Crafting Chaos
attributes.caption: Chelsea and Steffie will be making crafts but every time there is a donation of at least $10.00 they will change something about it. One moment it's paper craft and the next it's clay. It's all depends on how many donations come in!
attributes.description: Chelsea and Steffie will be making crafts but every time there is a donation of at least $10.00 they will change something about it. One moment it's paper craft and the next it's clay. It's all depends on how many donations come in!

attributes.title: Pokemon Card Opening
attributes.caption: Alfredo has wrangled together a collection of the best Pokémon Hunters he could! Join in on the fun as they open Pokémon cards and eat some strange things.
attributes.description: Alfredo has wrangled together a collection of the best Pokémon Hunters he could! Join in on the fun as they open Pokémon cards and eat some strange things.

attributes.title: Broadcast Boys
attributes.caption: Christian, Nick, and Cody terrorize each other in Ultimate Chicken Horse and we hope you join in on the chaos!
attributes.description: Christian, Nick, and Cody terrorize each other in Ultimate Chicken Horse and we hope you join in on the chaos!

attributes.title: Dark Souls Challenge
attributes.caption: Josh, Cole, and Kyle are playing their way through Dark Souls 3 to see who can get the farthest BUT there is one big twist, you can use your donations to affect the game using crowd control!
attributes.description: Josh, Cole, and Kyle are playing their way through Dark Souls 3 to see who can get the farthest BUT there is one big twist, you can use your donations to affect the game using crowd control!

attributes.title: Achievement Hunter
attributes.caption: The Achievement Hunter Team Kickoff Extra Life 2021!
attributes.description: The Achievement Hunter Team Kickoff Extra Life 2021!

attributes.title: Lindsay vs. Chef Mike: Round 3
attributes.caption: Lindsay Jones & Chef Mike Haracz face off in the most intense competition in the kitchen for the third year in a row.
attributes.description: Lindsay Jones & Chef Mike Haracz face off in the most intense competition in the kitchen for the third year in a row. There’s a new twist this year and you can donate to hinder their progress and make changes to the competition!

attributes.title: Crossword Crossfit
attributes.caption: Your mind is a muscle, bro-tatochip - time to pump it up! World’s collide in RT’s edition of fitness and fanatics as we challenge talented members of the company’s team to answer simple questions with serious implications.
attributes.description: Your mind is a muscle, bro-tatochip - time to pump it up! World’s collide in RT’s edition of fitness and fanatics as we challenge talented members of the company’s team to answer simple questions with serious implications.

attributes.title: Pain Jenga
attributes.caption: It's been a LONG TIME so Kdin, Chad, Hector, and Noel get together to play their favorite mid-workday game... Jenga! However, this is Extra Life which means a piece pulled means a punishment due. Who will survive the TOWER OF TORTURE!?
attributes.description: It's been a LONG TIME so Kdin, Chad, Hector, and Noel get together to play their favorite mid-workday game... Jenga! However, this is Extra Life which means a piece pulled means a punishment due. Who will survive the TOWER OF TORTURE!?

attributes.title: Mario Game with Squad Team Force
attributes.caption: Squad Team Force has been transported to Yoshi's Island by a mysterious masked man in order to compete in a tournament of 6 challenging games.
attributes.description: Squad Team Force has been transported to Yoshi's Island by a mysterious masked man in order to compete in a tournament of 6 challenging games. And you, the audience, have the power to help them or hurt them along the way with your donations to Extra Life!
attributes.display_title: Mario Game with Squad Team Force

attributes.title: Funhaus’ Extra Live Extra Life Extravaganza
attributes.caption: Funhaus is LIVE raising money for Extra Life! Tune in for exclusive gaming sessions, live music, hot dog eating contests, a 1v1 Chess match w/Ryan versus Matt Peake, a dunk tank, AND EVEN MORE FUN SURPRISES!
attributes.description: Funhaus is LIVE raising money for Extra Life! Tune in for exclusive gaming sessions, live music, hot dog eating contests, a 1v1 Chess match w/Ryan versus Matt Peake, a dunk tank, AND EVEN MORE FUN SURPRISES!
attributes.display_title: Funhaus’ Extra Live Extra Life Extravaganza

attributes.title: Squid Game
attributes.caption: In a surprise PR stunt, the Squid Game organization has tasked the Frontman with adapting their death game into a family friendly charity event. As the VIPs watching from home, your donations can help or hurt the contestants.
attributes.description: In a surprise PR stunt, the Squid Game organization has tasked the Frontman with adapting their death game into a family friendly charity event. As the VIPs watching from home, your donations can help or hurt the contestants.

attributes.title: Werewolves
attributes.caption: Werewolves makes its return for Extra Life 2021! This year villagers have their choice of execution: a ball launched via slingshot or one spicy boi.
attributes.description: Werewolves makes its return for Extra Life 2021! This year villagers have their choice of execution: a ball launched via slingshot or one spicy boi.

attributes.title: Nice Dynamite
attributes.caption: Team Nice Dynamite closes out Extra Life 2021 with a new challenge and special guest, Brad Stuver from Austin FC, to deal out their punishments!
attributes.description: Team Nice Dynamite closes out Extra Life 2021 with a new challenge and special guest, Brad Stuver from Austin FC, to deal out their punishments!

attributes.title: Closing Ceremony
attributes.caption: Rooster Teeth members close out Extra Life 2021.
attributes.description: Rooster Teeth members close out Extra Life 2021.

attributes.title: Best of Extra Life 2021
attributes.caption: Take a look at some of the best moments of our 2021 Extra Life Stream! What was your favorite moment?
attributes.description:
You can still donate to Extra Life at http://Donate.RoosterTeeth.com
Take a look at some of the best moments of our 2021 Extra Life Stream! What was your favorite moment?
